name: shamir-sharing
description: Shamir's Secret Sharing split and restore tool

scripts.build_macos: pkg -t macos --out-path bin/macos shamir-split.js && pkg -t macos --out-path bin/macos shamir-restore.js && cd bin/macos && shasum -p -a 256 shamir-* > macos-shamir-sharing.sha256
scripts.build_linux: pkg -t linux --out-path bin/linux shamir-split.js && pkg -t linux --out-path bin/linux shamir-restore.js && cd bin/linux && shasum -p -a 256 shamir-* > linux-shamir-sharing.sha256
scripts.build_win: pkg -t win --out-path bin/win shamir-split.js && pkg -t win --out-path bin/win shamir-restore.js && cd bin/win && shasum -p -a 256 shamir-* > win-shamir-sharing.sha256
scripts.build: npm run build_macos && npm run build_linux && npm run build_win

author: Themand
